verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] considering a full , posthumous pardon for Jack Johnson , the first black heavyweight boxing champion , who was convicted of racially tinged federal morals charges more than a century ago .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: considering] [ARG1: a full , posthumous pardon for Jack Johnson , the first black heavyweight boxing champion , who was convicted of racially tinged federal morals charges more than a century ago] .

President Donald Trump is considering a full , posthumous pardon for Jack Johnson , the first black heavyweight boxing champion , who [V: was] convicted of racially tinged federal morals charges more than a century ago .

President Donald Trump is considering a full , posthumous pardon for Jack Johnson , [ARG1: the first black heavyweight boxing champion] , [R-ARG1: who] was [V: convicted] [ARG2: of racially tinged federal morals charges] [ARGM-TMP: more than a century ago] .

President Donald Trump is considering a full , posthumous pardon for Jack Johnson , the first black heavyweight boxing champion , who was convicted of [ARGM-MNR: racially] [V: tinged] [ARG1: federal morals charges] more than a century ago .
